mention.text: the transition to polar night in ice-covered Antarctic lakes High-latitude environments , such as the Antarctic McMurdo Dry Valley lakes , are subject to seasonally segregated light-dark cycles , which have important consequences for microbial diversity and function on an annual basis

polar night in ice-covered Antarctic lakes High-latitude environments , such as the Antarctic McMurdo Dry Valley lakes , are subject to seasonally segregated light-dark cycles , which have important consequences for microbial diversity and function on an annual basis
